/* SysCode.selectList */ SELECT A.COMPANY ,A.PRE_CD ,B.LOCALE_CD ,A.CODE ,B.CODE_NM ,A.REF1 ,A.REF2 ,A.REF4 ,A.REF5 ,B.MEMO ,B.CREATER ,B.CREATE_DT ,B.CHANGER ,B.CHANGE_DT ,B.CHANGE_IP FROM SYS_CODE A, ( SELECT A.COMPANY ,A.PRE_CD ,A.CODE ,A.LOCALE_CD ,A.CODE_NM ,A.REF1 ,A.REF2 ,A.REF4 ,A.REF5 ,A.MEMO ,A.CREATER ,A.CREATE_DT ,A.CHANGER ,A.CHANGE_DT ,A.CHANGE_IP FROM SYS_CODE_LOCALE A WHERE A.PRE_CD = #{PRE_CD} AND A.LOCALE_CD IN( SELECT REF1 FROM SYS_CODE WHERE PRE_CD='COM_000002' AND CODE ='DEFAULT' ) AND A.CODE!='0000000000'
) B WHERE A.COMPANY = B.COMPANY AND A.PRE_CD = B.PRE_CD AND A.CODE = B.CODE AND A.PRE_CD = #{PRE_CD} ORDER BY A.PRE_CD ,A.SORT

/* SysCodeGroup.selectLocaleList */ SELECT A.COMPANY, A.PRE_CD, B.LOCALE_CD, A.CODE, B.CODE_NM, A.REF1, A.REF2, A.REF3, A.REF4, A.REF5, A.SORT, B.MEMO, A.CREATER, A.CREATE_DT, A.CHANGER, A.CHANGE_DT, A.CHANGE_IP FROM SYS_CODE A, SYS_CODE_LOCALE B WHERE A.COMPANY = B.COMPANY AND A.PRE_CD = B.PRE_CD AND A.CODE = B.CODE AND A.PRE_CD = #{PRE_CD} ORDER BY A.PRE_CD , A.SORT
